jchess.ruleengine

Interface IRuleProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRuleProcessor, ExtendedRuleProcessor

    public interface IRuleProcessor
    This interface provides abstraction to different RuleProcessors. It is designed to keep Rule loosely coupled of the main game logic and developer can create different code files for different boards.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
